thread.title: #BBNaija: Banky W begs fans to forgive Gifty
thread.title_full: #BBNaija: Banky W begs fans to forgive Gifty

author: Temiloluwa Temiloluwa
title: #BBNaija: Banky W begs fans to forgive Gifty
text:
Tweet 
Following reaction’s to Gifty’s denial of knowing Banky W and her subsequent complaints about him in the diary room, Banky W has called on Nigerians to pardon the housemate. 
Gifty who had earlier denied knowing Falz told Biggie in the diary room that Banky W was proud and he acted as if he was paid to visit the housemates. 
But Banky W denied being paid to visit, saying the producer just only called him up because he was in town and he accepted to come. He called on Nigerians to please forgive the housemate and move one. 
See Banky W’s post about the whole incident below. A post shared by Banky W. (@bankywellington) on Feb 16, 2017 at 1:51pm PST
